Module com.example.cincuentazo
Package com.example.cincuentazo.Model

Class AceValueCardDecorator

java.lang.Object
com.example.cincuentazo.Model.CardDecorator
com.example.cincuentazo.Model.AceValueCardDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardInterface
public class AceValueCardDecorator extends CardDecorator
Concrete decorator class that adds functionality to handle Ace card values. This class is used as a decorator in the Decorator pattern. The Decorator pattern allows for dynamically adding functionality to a card without altering its structure.
